text: Ezɨ kamaghɨn amizɨma kɨ osɨmtɨzir kaba ateri, egha kɨ aghumsɨzir puvatɨ. Kɨ, gumazir kɨ nɨghnɨzir gavgavim an itim, kɨ a gɨfogha gɨfa. Ezɨ kɨ fo, a ingangarir a nan dafarim gatɨzir kam a deraghvɨram an ganam, egh mamaghɨra ikɨ mangɨva dughiar Krais otoghamimɨn tugham. Bizir kam bagha kɨ aghumsɨzir puvatɨ.
